text: Sopot () is a city in Pomeranian Voivodeship in Poland. It is on the southern coast of the Baltic Sea and has about 40,000 inhabitants. == Twin towns – sister cities == Sopot is twinned with: * Ashkelon, Israel * Frankenthal, Germany * Karlshamn, Sweden * Næstved, Denmark * Peterhof, Russia * Ratzeburg, Germany * Southend-on-Sea, England, United Kingdom * Zakopane, Poland Category:Cities in Pomeranian Voivodeship Category:Port cities and towns of the Baltic Sea
title: Sopot
